data.message:
Dear Facebook, 
I like that you're trying to improve the mobile application to make messaging easier. I really do. I just don't like being forced into downloading a separate application for it. So until this gets changed, I won't be using facebook to send messages from my mobile device. Thanks! 
Until later I suppose =)

replies.message: I agree with stephen here, i am a fan of self improvment but do not wish to have a second app and also do not like being forced over.... so, i will no longer me sending messages over facebook applicarions, because for me it is no longer an option
Apologies, but... do you really think they care?
